languages.text: {n}Ткач указывает пальцем вверх, на вентиляционную шахту, откуда вы прибыли в храм впервые.{/n} "Путь к мирянам сложен. Запутан. Я отведу".

{n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."
languages.original_text: {n}Ткач указывает пальцем вверх, на вентиляционную шахту, откуда вы прибыли в храм впервые.{/n} "Путь к мирянам сложен. Запутан. Я отведу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The weaver points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you got into the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople are is complicated. Mazelike. Let me show."
{n}The weaver points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you got into the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople are is complicated. Mazelike. Let me show."

{n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople are is complex. Maze-like. Let me show you."

{n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople are is complex. Maze-like. Let me show you."

{n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

{n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

languages.text: {n}Le tisseur pointe du doigt le conduit de ventilation qui vous a permis d'accéder au temple la première fois.{/n} « Le chemin jusqu'aux quartiers d'habitation des profanes est complexe. On pourrait même parler d'une toile. Laissez-moi vous guider. »
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le tisseur pointe du doigt le conduit de ventilation qui vous a permis d'accéder au temple la première fois.{/n} « Le chemin jusqu'aux quartiers d'habitation des profanes est complexe. On pourrait même parler d'une toile. Laissez-moi vous guider. »

languages.text: {n}El tejedor señala hacia arriba, al conducto de ventilación por el que llegaste al templo la primera vez.{/n} «El camino que lleva hasta los laicos es complejo. Déjeme que le ayude».
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tejedor señala hacia arriba, al conducto de ventilación por el que llegaste al templo la primera vez.{/n} «El camino que lleva hasta los laicos es complejo. Déjeme que le ayude».

languages.text: {n}織り手は指を上に向け、最初に神殿に辿り着いたときに通った換気シャフトを指す。{/n}「平信徒が住む場所へ行く道は複雑です。まるで網のように。私がご案内しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}織り手は指を上に向け、最初に神殿に辿り着いたときに通った換気シャフトを指す。{/n}「平信徒が住む場所へ行く道は複雑です。まるで網のように。私がご案内しましょう」

languages.text: {n}织网者指向上方，指着你第一次跃入圣殿时的通风竖井。{/n}“通往教外人士居住区的小径曲折而复杂，如同蛛网一般。请让我为您带路吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}织网者指向上方，指着你第一次跃入圣殿时的通风竖井。{/n}“通往教外人士居住区的小径曲折而复杂，如同蛛网一般。请让我为您带路吧。”

languages.text: {n}Der Weber deutet mit dem Finger nach oben, auf den Belüftungsschacht, durch den du beim ersten Mal in den Tempel gelangt bist.{/n} "Der Weg zu den Behausungen der Laien ist komplex. Netzähnlich. Ich zeige ihn Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Weber deutet mit dem Finger nach oben, auf den Belüftungsschacht, durch den du beim ersten Mal in den Tempel gelangt bist.{/n} "Der Weg zu den Behausungen der Laien ist komplex. Netzähnlich. Ich zeige ihn Euch."

languages.text: {n}Dokur, parmağıyla yukarıdaki havalandırma şaftını işaret ediyor. Tapınağa ilk kez buradan girmiştin.{/n} "Avam tabakası yerleşkesinin ağı andırırcasına karmaşık bir hâl aldığı yere. Size göstereyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner points his finger upward, at the ventilation shaft through which you reached the temple the first time.{/n} "The path to where the laypeople dwell is complex. Web-like. Let me show you."
